name: Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70821PC

reviews.name: Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70821PC
reviews.reviewText: Very user friendly vacuum. Retractable cord, one button push to release and dump the bagless container, great for my hard wood floors, rugs & carpet. My Mother cued me in to this one after reading consumer reports - she replaced her Dyson with this and said its better than that!!! I had to get one after my Mom's recommendation. I recommend this for sure!!
reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Price!

reviews.name: Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70821PC
reviews.reviewText: have used twice, good suction, rolls easily, well pleased
reviews.title: great vacuum for price

reviews.name: Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70821PC
reviews.reviewText: This is the best vacuum I've ever owned, awesome pick up power and the cord wrap is a super plus! Definitely worth the buy!
reviews.title: Awesome pick up!
